original_text: A person might see that the mark on his skin had grown. This might happen after the priest had said that the disease had left him. Then the person must go again to the priest.
korean_text: 그러나 그가 정결한지를 제사장에게 보인 후에 병이 피부에 퍼지면 제사장에게 다시 보일 것이요

sentences.original_text: that the mark on his skin had grown
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 피부에 있는 흉터가 자랐다는 것을

sentences.original_text: that the disease had left him
Then the person must go again
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그 사람은 다시 가야 한다
